name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tasksify AI - Your Day-to-Day AI Assistant

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI-powered assistant that answers questions tailored to what you're doing. Simplify ask and get real-time insights while browsing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform the way you tackle homework and learning with Tasksify AI, your 24/7 academic assistant. Whether you're solving complex equations, understanding tough concepts, or writing assignments, Tasksify AI is here to help with personalized, step-by-step guidance across all subjects and levels.

🔑 Key Features
🌟 Instant, Accurate Solutions
Snap a photo, upload a screenshot, or type your question—get lightning-fast, precise answers and detailed explanations.
Master concepts with step-by-step breakdowns designed to build confidence and understanding.

📚 Comprehensive Subject Coverage
Math: Solve everything from algebra to advanced calculus.
Science: Get clarity in physics, chemistry, biology, and more.
Humanities: Simplify history, literature, and essay writing.
And much more—tailored for every grade level and subject area.

🖼️ Versatile Input Options
Take a screenshot or upload images, including LaTeX equations, for instant solutions.
Highlight and solve directly from any webpage.

✨ Enhanced Academic Support
Leverage advanced AI models like GPT and Claude to deliver answers 20% more accurately than competitors.
Explore related resources to deepen your understanding.

💻 Seamless Integration
Works effortlessly with popular learning platforms like Canvas, Blackboard, and Moodle.

✍️ AI Writing Assistant
Improve your essays, summaries, and grammar with intelligent suggestions and polished results.

🔒 Privacy First
Your data stays with you, fully compliant with privacy laws like GDPR and the California Privacy Act.
All uploads are secured for your peace of mind.

🚀 Get Started Today
Add Tasksify AI to Chrome and pin it to your toolbar.
Take a screenshot, type a question, or highlight text to get instant answers.
Unlock your learning potential with Tasksify AI—your personalized study partner.

🔗 Free to Use with Pro Options
Enjoy our free plan or upgrade to Pro for unlimited access. Available across all devices and platforms.
